content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 46, "index": 13}, {"type": "acacia_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "dark_oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 48, "index": 26}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 14, "index": 27}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 29}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 5, "index": 35}]

thought: To craft a crimson trapdoor, I need to craft 4 crimson planks, which requires me to place 1 stripped crimson stem into the crafting grid. I have a stripped crimson stem in slot 29, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 46, "index": 13}, {"type": "acacia_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "dark_oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 48, "index": 26}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 14, "index": 27}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 5, "index": 35}]
thought: I have crafted the crimson planks, so I will move them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 46, "index": 13}, {"type": "acacia_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "dark_oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 48, "index": 26}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 14, "index": 27}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 5, "index": 35}]

thought: To craft a crimson trapdoor, I need to first craft crimson planks. I already have some crimson planks in my inventory, but not enough for the trapdoor recipe. Therefore, I will use the stripped crimson stem in slot 29 to craft more planks.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 46, "index": 13}, {"type": "acacia_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "dark_oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 48, "index": 26}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 14, "index": 27}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 5, "index": 35}]
thought: I now have enough crimson planks to craft the trapdoor. I will move the planks from slot 0 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 46, "index": 13}, {"type": "acacia_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "dark_oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 48, "index": 26}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 14, "index": 27}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 5, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft the crimson trapdoor, I need to place three planks of crimson wood in each row of the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move one plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 46, "index": 13}, {"type": "acacia_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "dark_oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 48, "index": 26}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 14, "index": 27}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 5, "index": 35}]
thought: I have already placed one plank in the first row of the crafting grid, so I will now place another plank in the second slot of the first row.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
